PARTICIPANT_IS_NOT_ACTIVE
from the validator docker container logs
hey

, looks like 14/16 SVs have whitelisted our IP address on Devnet however when starting the node using docker compose, the validator container is unhealthy with the following logs:

Any idea why this is so?

text:

text:
yeap I did that with this command -> curl -X POST $SPONSOR_SV_URL/api/sv/v0/devnet/onboard/validator/prepare

SPONSOR_SV_URL=<https://sv.sv-1.dev.global.canton.network.sync.global>
